   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2024-07-20"

  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010300

  */

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2024-01-08"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2024-01-09"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010300

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-12-16"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-12-18"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010300

 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-11-24"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-11-25"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010300

   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-10-28"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-10-29"
 #endif

  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

 #endif

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-08-24"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-08-25"

  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

  */

  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-01-07"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2023-01-08"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010200

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-12-04"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-12-05"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010200

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-10-24"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-10-25"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010200

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-09-22"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-09-23"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010200

 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-08-25"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-08-26"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02010100

 #endif

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-07-28"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2022-07-29"

  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

 #ifndef DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION
   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-08-14"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-08-15"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02000901

 #ifndef DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION
   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-07-25"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-07-26"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 02000901

   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-07-06"

  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.

   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-05-28"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-05-29"

  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

 #endif

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release

  * to alert users to major changes.

+++ b/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h
@@ -35,21 +35,21 @@
 #ifndef DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION
   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-01-29"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-01-30"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020008

   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2021-01-10"

  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.

  * to alert users to major changes.

@@ -35,21 +35,21 @@
 #ifndef DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION
   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-09-14"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-09-15"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020006

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-08-25"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-08-26"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020006

-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-08-05"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-08-06"
 #endif

  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020006

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release

--- a/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h
+++ b/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h
@@ -35,21 +35,21 @@
 #ifndef DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION
   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-06-27"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-06-28"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020006

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.

  * to alert users to major changes.

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-05-19"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-05-20"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020005

 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-04-30"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-05-01"
 #endif

  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020005

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-04-10"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-04-11"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020005

   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION " (GitHub)"
 #endif

  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-03-21"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-03-22"

  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

+++ b/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h
@@ -35,21 +35,21 @@
 #ifndef DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION
   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION " (GitHub)"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */
 #ifndef STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-03-02"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2020-03-03"
 #endif
 
 /**
  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */
 
 #define MARLIN_HEX_VERSION 020004

 #endif

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.

  * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
  * version was tagged.
  */

-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2019-11-18"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2019-11-29"

  * Minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
  * Set based on the release version number. Used to catch an attempt to use
  * older configurations. Override these if using a custom versioning scheme
  * to alert users to major changes.
  */

+++ b/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h
@@ -44,21 +44,21 @@
    * Verbose version identifier which should contain a reference to the location
    * from where the binary was downloaded or the source code was compiled.
    */
   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION " (Github)"
 
   /**
    * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
    * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
    * version was tagged.
    */
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2019-10-04"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2019-10-05"
 
   /**
    * Required minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
    *
    * You must increment this version number for every significant change such as,
    * but not limited to: ADD, DELETE RENAME OR REPURPOSE any directive/option on
    * the configuration files.
    */
   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_H_VERSION 020000
   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_ADV_H_VERSION 020000

    * Required minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
    *
    * You must increment this version number for every significant change such as,
    * but not limited to: ADD, DELETE RENAME OR REPURPOSE any directive/option on
    * the configuration files.
    */
   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_H_VERSION 020000
   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_ADV_H_VERSION 020000

   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION " (Github)"
 
   /**
    * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
    * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
    * version was tagged.
    */
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2019-08-17"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2019-08-18"
 
   /**
    * Required minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
    *
    * You must increment this version number for every significant change such as,
    * but not limited to: ADD, DELETE RENAME OR REPURPOSE any directive/option on
    * the configuration files.
    */
   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_H_VERSION 020000
   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_ADV_H_VERSION 020000

   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_ADV_H_VERSION 020000

+++ b/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h
@@ -44,21 +44,21 @@
    * Verbose version identifier which should contain a reference to the location
    * from where the binary was downloaded or the source code was compiled.
    */
   #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION " (Github)"
 
   /**
    * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
    * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
    * version was tagged.
    */
-  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2019-07-02"
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2019-07-03"

    * Required minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
    *
    * You must increment this version number for every significant change such as,
    * but not limited to: ADD, DELETE RENAME OR REPURPOSE any directive/option on
    * the configuration files.
    */
   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_H_VERSION 020000
   #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_ADV_H_VERSION 020000

commit 5be07b5db24069097f6a08f6341c55bb3160062f
Author: Scott Lahteine <github@thinkyhead.com>
Date:   Wed Sep 6 06:28:30 2017 -0500

    Move 'inc' files

diff --git a/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h b/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000..fa628f4216
--- /dev/null
+++ b/Marlin/src/inc/Version.h
@@ -0,0 +1,94 @@
+/**
+ * Marlin 3D Printer Firmware
+ * Copyright (C) 2016 MarlinFirmware [https://github.com/MarlinFirmware/Marlin]
+ *
+ * Based on Sprinter and grbl.
+ * Copyright (C) 2011 Camiel Gubbels / Erik van der Zalm
+ *
+ * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
+ * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
+ * the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
+ * (at your option) any later version.
+ *
+ * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
+ * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
+ * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
+ * GNU General Public License for more details.
+ *
+ * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
+ * along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
+ *
+ */
+
+/**
+ * This file is the standard Marlin version identifier file, all fields can be
+ * overriden by the ones defined on _Version.h by using the Configuration.h
+ * directive USE_AUTOMATIC_VERSIONING.
+ */
+
+#if ENABLED(USE_AUTOMATIC_VERSIONING)
+
+  #include "_Version.h"
+
+#else
+
+  /**
+   * Marlin release version identifier
+   */
+  #define SHORT_BUILD_VERSION "bugfix-2.0.x"
+
+  /**
+   * Verbose version identifier which should contain a reference to the location
+   * from where the binary was downloaded or the source code was compiled.
+   */
+  #define DETAILED_BUILD_VERSION SHORT_BUILD_VERSION " (Github)"
+
+  /**
+   * The STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE represents when the binary file was built,
+   * here we define this default string as the date where the latest release
+   * version was tagged.
+   */
+  #define STRING_DISTRIBUTION_DATE "2017-07-27 12:00"
+
+  /**
+   * Required minimum Configuration.h and Configuration_adv.h file versions.
+   *
+   * You must increment this version number for every significant change such as,
+   * but not limited to: ADD, DELETE RENAME OR REPURPOSE any directive/option on
+   * the configuration files.
+   */
+  #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_H_VERSION 020000
+  #define REQUIRED_CONFIGURATION_ADV_H_VERSION 020000
+
+  /**
+   * The protocol for communication to the host. Protocol indicates communication
+   * standards such as the use of ASCII, "echo:" and "error:" line prefixes, etc.
+   * (Other behaviors are given by the firmware version and capabilities report.)
+   */
+  #define PROTOCOL_VERSION "1.0"
+
+  /**
+   * Defines a generic printer name to be output to the LCD after booting Marlin.
+   */
+  #define MACHINE_NAME "3D Printer"
+
+  /**
+   * The SOURCE_CODE_URL is the location where users will find the Marlin Source
+   * Code which is installed on the device. In most cases —unless the manufacturer
+   * has a distinct Github fork— the Source Code URL should just be the main
+   * Marlin repository.
+   */
+  #define SOURCE_CODE_URL "https://github.com/MarlinFirmware/Marlin"
+
+  /**
+   * Default generic printer UUID.
+   */
+  #define DEFAULT_MACHINE_UUID "cede2a2f-41a2-4748-9b12-c55c62f367ff"
+
+  /**
+   * The WEBSITE_URL is the location where users can get more information such as
+   * documentation about a specific Marlin release.
+   */
+  #define WEBSITE_URL "http://marlinfw.org"
+
+#endif // USE_AUTOMATIC_VERSIONING
